main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Little Rock, Arkansas on June 13, 1963, involving an object described as a 'Saucer with red dome changing to white and back.' The object was observed disappearing and reappearing at intervals before eventually disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10-15 minutes., The object was noted to disappear and reappear at intervals., The witnesses included personnel involved in refueling operations nearby., There were numerous take-offs and landings from Little Rock Air Force Base during the sighting,. A tentative appraisal suggested the sighting may have been related to military aircraft operations in the area.
sighted object: Saucer with red dome changing to white and back
witness description: Civilian youth who seemed sincere but inexperienced in aircraft
